    • Constructor Detail

      • LanePipeline

        public LanePipeline​(android.content.Context context)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize the Lane pipeline with a context. Runs the camera calibration
        Parameters:
        context - the android context (used for toast messages)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when calibration images are not found

    • Method Detail

      • setInputImage

        Sets the input image for the pipeline.
        Parameters:
        inputImage - the input image in OpenCV Mat format

      • runPipeline

        public org.opencv.core.Mat runPipeline()
        Runs the pipeline and returns the output image.
        Returns:
        output image with detected lanes in OpenCV Mat format

      • calibrateCamera

                      throws java.io.IOException
        Calibrates the camera using the calibration images in the assets folder.
        Parameters:
        chessboardSize - the size of the chessboard used for calibration
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when calibration images are not found

        Returns:
        the warped image in OpenCV Mat format

      • filter

        private org.opencv.core.Mat filter​(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
        Filters the image to only show the lane lines 1px wide
        Parameters:
        input - the input image in OpenCV Mat format
        Returns:
        the filtered image in OpenCV Mat format

      • findLanePoints

        private android.util.Pair<org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.WeightedObservedPoints,​org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.WeightedObservedPoints> findLanePoints​(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
        Finds the white pixels in the image and returns the x and y coordinates of the pixels This also filters for left and right lane lines
        Parameters:
        input - the filtered input image in OpenCV Mat format
        Returns:
        first element are the x and y coordinates of the left lane line, second element are the x and y coordinates of the right lane line

      • fitPolynomial

        private double[] fitPolynomial​(org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.WeightedObservedPoints points)
        fits a 2nd order polynomial on the given points
        Parameters:
        points - the points to fit the polynomial on
        Returns:
        the coefficients of the polynomial

      • drawLanes

        private org.opencv.core.Mat drawLanes​(int height,
                                      int width,
                                      double[] wLeft,
                                      double[] wRight)
        Draws lane lines on a blank image
        Parameters:
        height - the height of the image to draw
        width - the width of the image to draw
        wLeft - the coefficients of the left lane line
        wRight - the coefficients of the right lane line
        Returns:
        the image with the lane lines drawn

      • getRadius

        private double getRadius​(double[] parameters)
        Calculates the radius of the curvature of a single lane line
        Parameters:
        parameters - the coefficients of the polynomial
        Returns:
        the radius of the curvature

      • getKruemmung

        private double getKruemmung​(double[] wLeft,
                            double[] wRight)
        Calculates the radius of the curvature of the lane
        Parameters:
        wLeft - the coefficients of the left lane line
        wRight - the coefficients of the right lane line
        Returns:
        the radius of the lane

      • unwarp

        private org.opencv.core.Mat unwarp​(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
        Unwarps the image back to the original perspective
        Parameters:
        input - the input image in OpenCV Mat format
        Returns:
        the unwarped image in OpenCV Mat format

      • overlay

        private org.opencv.core.Mat overlay​(org.opencv.core.Mat original,
                                    org.opencv.core.Mat overlay)
        Overlays two images on top of each other. This is used to draw the lane lines on the original image
        Parameters:
        original - the original image
        overlay - the image to overlay on top of the original image
        Returns:
        the original image with the overlay image on top of it

      • convert2Lab

        private org.opencv.core.Mat convert2Lab​(org.opencv.core.Mat input)
        Converts the image to Lab color space
        Parameters:
        input - the input image in OpenCV Mat format in RGB
        Returns:
        the image in Lab color space

        Converts the image to HLS color space

        Returns:
